problem.markdown:
1. If center of mass and center of stiffness are located at same point then torsion will occur. () True (x) False
2) Torsional response of structures could not be induced by structural eccentricities. () True (x) False
3) If center of mass and center of stiffness are located in the same axis then torsion will occur in perpendicular axis. (x) True () False
4) Torsion can be seen mainly in unsymmetrical buildings. (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. If center of mass and center of stiffness are located at same point then torsion will occur.
2) Torsional response of structures could not be induced by structural eccentricities.
3) If center of mass and center of stiffness are located in the same axis then torsion will occur in perpendicular axis.
4) Torsion can be seen mainly in unsymmetrical buildings.
